biotools.summary: DeepPhospho is a tool to accelerate DIA phosphoproteome profiling by Deep Learning. It is used for the prediction of fragment ion intensity and retention time for phosphopeptides. DeepPhospho is a hybrid deep neural network combining LSTM and transformer modules and it is specifically developed for accurate prediction of fragment ion intensity and indexed retention time (iRT) for any given phosphopeptide.
